subtitle: Are you ready for a great experience?
whyChoose: Why Choose the mallorca live recording studio?
whyChooseSub:
Portable recording studio

At LR Studio (Live Recording Studio) we are dedicated to recording concerts and live sessions on simultaneous tracks to be able to mix and edit the content of each track individually in our Studio, to obtain the highest quality.

We have professional material suitable for this type of recording, obtaining high quality professional results.

As musicians and technicians that we are, we know how cumbersome, heavy and cold it is to record in a studio, the loss of power and emotions that are obtained from the individual recording by tracks of each musician, for this same reason, we bet on a type of more natural, more organic recording, obtaining the same sound quality as in a studio. But giving it more emotion, and freshness, in order to transmit to the listener the emotions that are in a live performance.
selectYourStudioSubtitle: Studios are price packs for live or multitrack recording
contactSub: Please fill out the quick form and we will bee in touch with lighting speed
forSupport: For support, booking or any questions
pleaseNote: Please note our working hours to avoid any disappointment.
